title.value: Теоретико-методологические аспекты экономического содержания и оценки экспортного потенциала АПК
Theoretical and methodological aspects of the economic contents and estimation of an AIC export potential
Theoretical and methodological aspects of the economic contents and estimation of an AIC export potential

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Mozol, A.V., Belarus State Economic Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Gavdur, V.N., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Sustainable development of agriculture of the republic depends largely on the prospects for the operation of export potential. Justification of the theo¬retical aspects of the content of this economic category as well as the methodological approach to the quantitative and qualitative assessment of the process of forming and using the export potential constituted the block of an aim-setting of this article. The offered approach will allow to exporters and to state controls more exactly and rationally, predict and realize export strategy, both on separate commodity positions, and on monoproducts. Besides, its application is possible at planning of all process of reproduction in the agricultural and processing enterprises
